SELECT cata_id, cata_name, cata_bigimg FROM (SELECT tt.*, ROWNUM AS rowno FROM ( SELECT c.cata_id, c.cata_name, c.cata_bigimg, (select count(*) from ser_browse s where s.status='1' and s.cata_id=c.cata_id) browse_count FROM ser_catalogue c where c.status = '1' order by browse_count desc ) tt WHERE ROWNUM <= 6) table_alias WHERE table_alias.rowno >= 0
